class.name: ToriiClient
class.brief_description: A client for interacting with a Dojo world's Torii network.
class.description: The ToriiClient is the main entry point for interacting with a Dojo world. It allows you to query the world's state and subscribe to real-time updates for entities, events, and more. To use it, add it to your scene tree (often as an autoload singleton), set the [member torii_url] property and the world addresses in the project settings, and then call [method create_client].

method.name: cancel_all_subscriptions
method.description: Cancels all active subscriptions.

method.name: create_client
method.description: Initializes and connects the client to the Torii server. If [param torii_url] is not provided, it will use the value from the [member torii_url] property. The client will also use the world addresses from the project settings. Emits [signal client_connected] on success or failure.

method.name: disconnect_client
method.description: Disconnects the client from the server. If [param send_signal] is true, it emits the [signal client_disconnected] signal.

method.name: get_achievements
method.description: Queries for achievements based on the provided [DojoAchievementQuery].

method.name: get_activities
method.description: Queries for activities based on the provided [DojoActivityQuery].

method.name: get_aggregations
method.description: Queries for aggregations based on the provided [DojoAggregationQuery].

method.name: get_client_info
method.description: Returns a dictionary with information about the client's current state, including connection status, Torii URL, and world address.

method.name: get_connection_status
method.description: Returns a dictionary with detailed connection status.

method.name: get_controller_info
method.description: A helper method to get information for a single controller by its address.

method.name: get_controllers
method.description: Queries for controllers based on the provided [DojoControllerQuery].

method.name: get_entities
method.description: Queries for entities based on the provided [DojoQuery]. [b]Note:[/b] On web platforms, this operation is asynchronous. It returns an empty array, and the result is delivered via the [signal entities_received] signal.

method.name: get_player_achievements
method.description: Queries for player achievements based on the provided [DojoPlayerAchievementQuery].

method.name: get_token_balances
method.description: Queries for token balances based on the provided [DojoTokenBalanceQuery].

method.name: get_token_collections
method.description: Queries for token contracts (collections) based on the provided [DojoContractQuery].

method.name: get_token_info
method.description: A helper method to get information for a single token contract by its address.

method.name: get_token_transfers
method.description: Queries for token transfers based on the provided [DojoTokenTransferQuery].

method.name: get_tokens
method.description: Queries for tokens (e.g., ERC721, ERC1155) based on the provided [DojoTokenQuery].

method.name: get_worlds_metadata
method.description: Fetches metadata for the specified world addresses. If no addresses are provided, it uses the ones configured in the client or in project settings.

method.name: is_client_connected
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the client is currently connected to the Torii server.

method.name: on_achievement_progression_update
method.description: Subscribes to achievement progression updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when a progression changes.

method.name: on_activity_update
method.description: Subscribes to activity updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when a new activity is recorded.

method.name: on_aggregation_update
method.description: Subscribes to aggregation updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when an aggregation value changes.

method.name: on_contract_update
method.description: Subscribes to updates for a specific contract. The [param callback] will be invoked with a dictionary containing the contract update data.

method.name: on_entity_state_update
method.description: Subscribes to state updates for entities matching the [param subscription] criteria. The [param callback] will be invoked with a dictionary representing the updated entity.

method.name: on_event_message_update
method.description: Subscribes to event messages. The [param callback] will be invoked when a new event message is received.

method.name: on_starknet_event
method.description: Subscribes to raw Starknet events. The [param callback] will be invoked when a matching event is emitted.

method.name: on_token_balance_update
method.description: Subscribes to token balance updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when a balance changes.

method.name: on_token_transfer_update
method.description: Subscribes to token transfer updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when a token is transferred.

method.name: on_token_update
method.description: Subscribes to token metadata updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when token information changes.

method.name: on_transaction
method.description: Subscribes to transaction updates. The [param callback] will be invoked when a new transaction is processed.

method.name: publish_message
method.description: Publishes a message to the off-chain message bus. This is an experimental feature.

method.name: publish_typed_message
method.description: Converts a [Dictionary] to a JSON string and publishes it using [method publish_message]. This is an experimental feature.

method.name: refresh_metadata
method.description: Calls [method get_world_metadata] and emits the [signal metadata_updated] signal with the result. Returns [code]true[/code] on success.

method.name: search
method.description: Searches for entities based on the provided [DojoSearchQuery].

method.name: update_achievement_progression
method.description: Updates an existing achievement progression subscription with new criteria.

method.name: update_activity_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing activity subscription with new criteria.

method.name: update_aggregation_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing aggregation subscription with new criteria.

method.name: update_contract_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing contract subscription with new criteria. [b]Note:[/b] Not yet implemented in the underlying dojo.c library.

method.name: update_entity_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing entity subscription with a new clause.

method.name: update_event_message_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing event message subscription with a new clause.

method.name: update_starknet_event_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing Starknet event subscription. [b]Note:[/b] Not yet implemented in the underlying dojo.c library.

method.name: update_subscription
method.description: A generic method to update any type of subscription. It will call the appropriate specific update method based on the subscription's type.

method.name: update_token_balance_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing token balance subscription with new criteria.

method.name: update_token_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing token subscription with new criteria. [b]Note:[/b] Not yet implemented in the underlying dojo.c library.

method.name: update_token_transfer_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing token transfer subscription with new criteria.

method.name: update_transaction_subscription
method.description: Updates an existing transaction subscription with a new filter. [b]Note:[/b] Not yet implemented in the underlying dojo.c library.

members.member: A [Callable] that will be invoked with log messages from the underlying dojo.c library.
A list of models from the world metadata.
The URL of the Torii gRPC server.

signal.name: client_connected
signal.description: Emitted when the client connection attempt is completed. [param success] is [code]true[/code] if the connection was successful.

signal.name: client_disconnected
signal.description: Emitted when the client is disconnected.

signal.name: contract_update
signal.description: Emitted when a contract subscribed to via [method on_contract_update] is updated.

signal.name: entities_received
signal.description: Emitted on web platforms with the result of a [method get_entities] call.

signal.name: entity_updated
signal.description: Emitted when an entity subscribed to via [method on_entity_state_update] is updated.

signal.name: event_received
signal.description: Emitted when an event is received from a subscription.

signal.name: message_published
signal.description: Emitted after a message is successfully published via [method publish_message], containing the message hash.

signal.name: metadata_updated
signal.description: Emitted when world metadata is fetched, either from [method get_world_metadata] or [method refresh_metadata].

signal.name: subscription_created
signal.description: Emitted when a new subscription is successfully created.

signal.name: subscription_error
signal.description: Emitted when an error occurs during subscription creation or update.

signal.name: token_balance_update
signal.description: Emitted when a token balance subscribed to via [method on_token_balance_update] is updated.

signal.name: token_transfer_update
signal.description: Emitted when a token transfer subscribed to via [method on_token_transfer_update] is updated.

signal.name: token_update
signal.description: Emitted when token metadata subscribed to via [method on_token_update] is updated.

signal.name: transaction_confirmed
signal.description: Emitted when a transaction is confirmed.
